sentences.sContent: Ice water is the only thing that really quenches my thirst (= gets rid of it ) .
sentences.sCn: 只有冰水才能让我真正解渴。

sentences.sContent: We had worked up a thirst (= done something that made us thirsty ) ，and so we decided to stop for a beer.
sentences.sCn: 我们干得口渴了，因此决定停下来喝杯啤酒。

sentences.sContent: Maggie woke up with a raging thirst (= an extremely strong thirst ) .
sentences.sCn: 玛吉醒来时感到口干舌燥。

words.tran: 口渴的，口干的；渴望的，热望的

trans.tranOther: the feeling of wanting or needing a drink
